tweaks.boatTurnsOnlyWhenMoving.title: Boat Turns Only When Moving
tweaks.boatTurnsOnlyWhenMoving.tooltip:
Boat can turn only when moving

Default: false
tweaks.boatSpeedMult.title: Boat Speed Multiplier
tweaks.boatSpeedMult.tooltip:
Boat movement speed multiplier

Default: 1

Range: 0.5 to 5
tweaks.boatTurnMult.title: Boat Turn Multiplier
tweaks.boatTurnMult.tooltip:
Boat turning speed multiplier

Default: 1

Range: 0.5 to 5
tweaks.showBoostGauge.title: Show Boost Gauge
tweaks.showBoostGauge.tooltip:
Show haste ability overheat gauge

Default: true
tweaks.boostCooldownMult.title: Boost Cooldown Multiplier
tweaks.boostCooldownMult.tooltip:
Haste ability heat loss rate multiplier

Default: 1

Range: 0.1 to 10
tweaks.boostSpeedMult.title: Boost Speed Multiplier
tweaks.boostSpeedMult.tooltip:
Haste ability speed multiplier

Your haste speed will be multiplied by this if this value is more then 1

Default: 1

Range: 1 to 5
tweaks.safeCollisionMagnitudeThreshold.t:
Safe collision speed threshold

You will not take any damage if your boat speed is below this when you collide with something.

Default: 0

Range: 0 to 10
tweaks.cargoBoatMassMult.title: Cargo Boat Mass Multiplier
tweaks.cargoBoatMassMult.tooltip:
Boat cargo weight

This is percent of boat cargo weight added to boat weight.
When you have no free space in inventory your boat's weight will double if you set this to 100%.

Default: 0

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.netBoatMassMult.title: Net Boat Mass Multiplier
tweaks.netBoatMassMult.tooltip:
Trawl net weight
 Percent of trawl net weight added to boat weight.

Default: 0

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.crabPotCatchRateMult.title: Crab Pot Catch Rate Multiplier
tweaks.crabPotCatchRateMult.tooltip:
Crab pot catch interval multiplier

Time needed for crab pot to catch anything will be multiplied by this

Default: 1

Range: 0.01 to 3
tweaks.crabPotCatchChance.title: Crab Pot Catch Chance
tweaks.crabPotCatchChance.tooltip:
Crab pot catch chance

Default: 1

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.crabPotDurabilityMultiplier.title: Crab Pot Durability Multiplier
tweaks.crabPotDurabilityMultiplier.toolt:
Crab pot durability multiplier

Default: 1

Range: 0.1 to 10
tweaks.chanceToCatchResearchPart.title: Chance To Catch Research Part
tweaks.chanceToCatchResearchPart.tooltip:
Chance to catch research part when dredging

Default: 0.07

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.dredgeSpots.title: Dredge Spots
tweaks.randomizeDredgeStock.title: Randomize Dredge Stock
tweaks.randomizeDredgeStock.tooltip:
Randomize stock at dredge spots

Default: false

tweaks.daytimeAberrationChance.tooltip:
Chance to catch aberrations during the day

Default: 0.01

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.nighttimeAberrationChance.title: Nighttime Aberration Chance
tweaks.nighttimeAberrationChance.tooltip:
Chance to catch aberrations at night

Default: 0.03

tweaks.fishingSpotDisableChance.tooltip:

Range: 0 to 1

tweaks.fishDecays.title: Fish Decays
tweaks.showMinigameAnimationFeedback.too:
Show fishing minigame animation feedback

Default: true

tweaks.showFishSpotInfo.tooltip:
Show fishing spot info

Default: true
tweaks.aberrationCatchBonusCap.title: Aberration Catch Bonus Cap
tweaks.aberrationCatchBonusCap.tooltip:
Aberration catch chance cap

Your chances to catch aberrations will be capped at this.

Default: 0.35

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.aberrationParticleFXonFishingSpot: Aberration Particle FX On Fishing Spot

Show particle effect on special fishing spots

Default: true
tweaks.specialFishingSpots.title: Special Fishing Spots
tweaks.specialFishingSpots.tooltip:
Special fishing spots

No fishing spot will give you 100% to catch aberrations if this is false.

Default: true
tweaks.minAtrophyAberrations.title: Min Atrophy Aberrations
tweaks.minAtrophyAberrations.tooltip:
Min number of aberrations caught by atrophy ability

Default: 1

Range: 0 to 10
tweaks.waterRipplesOnFishingSpot.title: Water Ripples On Fishing Spot
tweaks.waterRipplesOnFishingSpot.tooltip:
Water ripples on fishing spot

Default: true
tweaks.randomizeFishStock.title: Randomize Fish Stock
tweaks.randomizeFishStock.tooltip:
Randomize fish stock at fishing spots

Default: false
tweaks.cameraFOV.title: Camera FOV
tweaks.cameraFOV.tooltip:
Camera field of view

Default: 40

Range: 20 to 80
tweaks.dayLengthMult.title: Day Length Multiplier
tweaks.dayLengthMult.tooltip:
Day/night length multiplier

The higher the value the faster time passes when you move.

This does not affect anything else.

Default: 1

Range: 0.1 to 10
tweaks.controllerRumble.title: Controller Rumble
tweaks.showPOIicon.title: Show POI Icon
tweaks.showPOIicon.tooltip:
Show point of interest icon when you are close to it

Default: true
tweaks.showPlayerMarkerOnMap.title: Show Player Marker On Map
tweaks.showPlayerMarkerOnMap.tooltip:
Show player marker on map

Default: true
tweaks.showOrangeParticlesOnPOI.title: Show Orange Particles On POI
tweaks.showOrangeParticlesOnPOI.tooltip:
Show orange particles on point of interest

Default: true
tweaks.showPOIglint.title: Show POI Glint
tweaks.showPOIglint.tooltip:
Show point of interest glint particle FX

Default: true
tweaks.spyGlassShowsFishingSpots.title: Spyglass Shows Fishing Spots
tweaks.spyGlassShowsFishingSpots.tooltip:
Spy glass shows fishing spots

Default: true
tweaks.showRelicParticles.title: Show Relic Particles
tweaks.showRelicParticles.tooltip:
Show relic beam particle FX

Default: true
tweaks.noAbilityCooldown.title: No Ability Cooldown
tweaks.noAbilityCooldown.tooltip:
Abilities have no cooldown timer

Default: false
tweaks.onlyActivateBoostWhenMoving.title: Only Activate Boost When Moving
tweaks.onlyActivateBoostWhenMoving.toolt:
Make it so you can activate haste ability only when moving

Default: true
tweaks.sellExtraItems.title: Sell Extra Items
tweaks.sellExtraItems.tooltip:
Make it so you can sell Peculiar Engine, Sampling Device, pieces of treasure map

Default: true
tweaks.buyLockedLights.title: Buy Locked Lights
tweaks.buyLockedLights.tooltip:
Make it so you can buy the Halogen, Tungsten, Incandescent lights without chapter progression

Default: true
tweaks.sanityMultiplier.title: Sanity Multiplier
tweaks.sanityMultiplier.tooltip:
Sanity change rate multiplier

Your sanity recovery and loss rate will be multiplied by this

Default: 1

Range: 0.1 to 10
tweaks.sanityAberrationCatchBonus.title: Sanity Aberration Catch Bonus
tweaks.sanityAberrationCatchBonus.toolti:
Bonus chance to catch aberrations that scales with your sanity.

For example, if you set this to 50% your chance to catch aberrations will increase by 25% when your sanity is at 50% and by 50% when your sanity is at 0%.

Default: 0

Range: 0 to 1
tweaks.showNetCatchCount.title: Show Net Catch Count
tweaks.showNetCatchCount.tooltip:
Show trawl net catch count

Default: true
tweaks.netCatchSound.title: Net Catch Sound
tweaks.netCatchSound.tooltip:
Trawl net catch sound

Default: true

tweaks.netCatchRateMult.tooltip:

tweaks.netCatchMaterialChance.tooltip:

tweaks.netCatchChance.tooltip:
